projects.title: File Organiser
projects.description: An automated file organization tool that sorts and categorizes files based on type, helping keep your directories clean and organized.

projects.title: Web Scraper
projects.description: A powerful web scraping tool designed to extract and parse data from websites efficiently for data analysis and collection.

projects.title: ChatBot
projects.description: An intelligent conversational AI chatbot with natural language processing capabilities for interactive user communication.

projects.title: PHP Website
projects.description: A dynamic website built with PHP featuring server-side functionality, database integration, and modern web development practices.

projects.title: Multi-Tool
projects.description: A versatile multi-purpose utility tool providing various helpful functions and features in a single application.

projects.title: Typing Speed Test
projects.description: An interactive typing speed test application that measures WPM (words per minute) and accuracy to improve typing skills.

projects.title: Clicker Game
projects.description: An engaging incremental clicker game with progression mechanics, upgrades, and achievements for endless entertainment.

projects.title: Hangman Game
projects.description: A classic word-guessing game built in Java featuring multiple difficulty levels and an interactive gameplay experience.

projects.title: MegaBot - Discord Bot
projects.description: A feature-rich Discord bot with 70+ slash commands across 8 categories including economy, gaming, moderation, and utility features with SQLite database integration.

projects.title: MegaBot Website
projects.description: A modern marketing website for MegaBot featuring command documentation, feature showcase, and user-friendly interface built with responsive design.

aboutInfo.bio: Hi! I'm a passionate software developer and second-year student. I love building projects that solve real-world problems and continuously learning new technologies to improve my skills.
